name: Word Driven
description:
We give you 3 letters, you enter a word that has those 3 letters, in that order. The longer the word, the more points you get.

Very simple rules that make a great word challenge. Sure, if EAR are the letters it's simple, but what if the letters are WXW or IJA? (You'd enter Waxworks & Ninja, of couse!)

Word Driven includes several game types. You can play in Race mode to get as many points as you can before time runs out. Or play a leisurely Road Trip game, without any timers at all for each 3 letter combination--but you lose a bunch of points of you give up on a combination and pass.

4 difficulty levels make it fun for any age, from young spellers to word-game masters. (At the hardest difficulty setting, it is one of the most challenging word games anywhere.) Are you Word Driven?


✭✭✭ Featured in "New and Noteworthy" by Apple! ✭✭✭

✭ Over 180,000 words in its dictionary! From aardvark to zymurgy.
✭ Universal, iPhone and iPad in one.
✭ Tap the car on the main menu to choose from your Garage.
✭ GameCenter lets you see how your high scores compares against your friends and the world.
✭ Features In-App Purchase: enjoy the game for free, buy to enable more levels and difficulty settings.
